name: Hopscotch
description:
Hopscotch 3D - an attentiveness jumping game, inspired by the children's game of "Hopscotch", with lots of levels and increasing difficulty. Game lanes are composed of different designs, ranging from simple colors and shapes and ending numbers, fruits, and even animals will not get bored. Beware the janitor, followed over the order on the street, use bonus springs to jump on, open new characters and a variety of amplifying abilities, set new records. Plunge into the atmosphere of childhood, jump and have fun!

Features:
• Jump on squares by taping buttons in the correct order;
• Improving abilities that facilitate the passage;
• Colorful levels and music;
• Bright and beautiful characters;
• Hundreds of levels;
• Simple controls
